title: Add clickable contact email to Contact section and footer

requirements.summary: Display the contact email callcraftaai@gmail.com in all visible contact areas (Contact section and footer) as a clickable mailto link with an English label and consistent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays the email address exactly as: callcraftaai@gmail.com
Clicking/tapping the email opens the user’s email client via a mailto:callcraftaai@gmail.com link
If the site has a footer contact area, the same email is shown there as well
User-facing label text is in English (e.g., "Email"), and the email link is visually consistent with existing contact links (e.g., phone)

file_operations.description: Update the marketing site’s contact information UI to include an "Email" row/link displaying callcraftaai@gmail.com as a mailto:callcraftaai@gmail.com anchor anywhere contact details are presented (including the Contact section and any footer contact area), matching the existing phone link’s visual style (typography/color/hover) and keeping copy in English.
